front.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Trial Use Recommended Practice for Digital Rights Expression Languages (DRELs) Suitable for eLearning Technologies

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This project should produce a recommended practice identifying Digital Rights (DR) requirements for eLearning technologies. These requirements should be aligned with the most widely known standards-based specifications for DREL that are being adopted or developed by international, regional, national and private organizations and consortia.
